description.p: This mechanical construct, created by Macha of Draenoth, serves as a upgraded appendage, granting proficiency in slight of hand, as well as an assortment of tools to make jobs like lockpicking and tinkering much easier (rolled with advantage). If using this hand as an unarmed attack, add a +2 to attack and a +6 to damage.

set.name: attunement
set.addition: by a creature missing some or all of a limb
